name: transformingAttributes(_:_:_:_:)
desc: Returns an attributed string by calling a closure that transforms three attributes of a source attributed string.
declaration: func transformingAttributes<K1, K2, K3>(_ k: K1.Type, _ k2: K2.Type, _ k3: K3.Type, _ c: (inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K1>, inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K2>, inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K3>) -> Void) -> AttributedString where K1 : AttributedStringKey, K2 : AttributedStringKey, K3 : AttributedStringKey
